content:
Here are the 21st century life skills that are essential to succeed in today's fast-paced and ever-changing world:

* Adaptability
* Emotional intelligence
* Critical thinking
* Effective communication
* Problem-solving
* Creativity
* Digital literacy

For a new tradesperson:

* Work Skills:
	+ Mastering technology
	+ Staying up-to-date with industry developments
	+ Safety and compliance
* Technical Skills:
	+ Proficiency in chosen trade
	+ Understanding of materials and equipment
	+ Attention to detail

For an entrepreneur:

* Work Skills:
	+ Mastering technology
	+ Networking and marketing
	+ Financial management
* Entrepreneurial Skills:
	+ Creativity and innovation
	+ Risk management
	+ Strategic thinking

For a leader:

* Work Skills:
	+ Mastering technology
	+ Leadership and management
	+ Project management
* Life Skills:
	+ Emotional intelligence
	+ Adaptability and resilience
	+ Effective communication

Please note that these are general lists of skills, depending on the specific field or industry, there may be other specific skills that are required.
